sorry dude it didn't work for me. and i'm pretty sure many people would also experience this problem if they follow your instructions. Keygen is working fine, I guess the crack is not necessarily important. This download is clean and working properly but your instruction won't work. What I did was this:

how to install and register:

1. install sony vegas pro. once installed, don't open the program.

2. right click the keygen and select "run as administrator."

3. choose vegas pro 9 series.

4. click "generate" five times.

5. click the "patch button. Find the Sony vegas pro installed directory. Program 

Files/Sony/vegas 9.

6. don't close the keygen afterwards.

7. open sony vegas pro 9.

8. enter the serial you have generated.

9. register from another computer.

10. enter the activation/authentication code included in the keygen.

11. you're done.

anyway, i forgot to include the ff. these are the fake information you need to add:

First Name: Blahh

Last Name: Blahh

Email Add: myemail@hotmail.com

Country: wherever you're from


**Others not mentioned, just leave it blank.

uncheck the first box that says i would like to receive news and information

check the second box (policy and agreement)

That's it and you're good to go :D
